author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO HOLDS STEADY AS A CATEGORY FOUR HURRICANE NEARING THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN...
summary: ...KIKO HOLDS STEADY AS A CATEGORY FOUR HURRICANE NEARING THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN... As of 11:00 PM HST Fri Sep 05 the center of Kiko was located near 15.1, -139.7 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 946 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO HOLDS STEADY AS A CATEGORY FOUR HURRICANE NEARING THE CENTRAL PACIFIC BASIN... As of 11:00 PM HST Fri Sep 05 the center of Kiko was located near 15.1, -139.7 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 946 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 140 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (EP1/EP112025)
